column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Deeeeeelicious!!! Everything is absolutely amazing and we can't even pick a favorite. Sangrias are always go-to
column2: but the mojitos are fresh as can be!!! All the tapas had so much flavor
column3: more than any other place we've been of the same sort. Hot and fresh
column4: even with the place packed!!! Service is also so great even though they have so many people to take care of! Ham and cheese croquetas a must
column5: as well as the spicy potatoes
column7: garlic shrimp.... Always a great time!
